DataElement.preferredName: Other Organ Clinical Involvement Site Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The text response specifying the other organs/tissues sites that are clinically involved.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._A unique macroscopic (gross) anatomic structure that performs specific functions.  It is composed of various tissues.  An organ is part of an anatomic system or a body region.  Representative examples include the heart, lung, liver, spleen, and uterus._Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity._To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process._A position in relation to its surroundings.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:A part of the body that performs a specific function.  For example, the heart is an organ.:Having to do with the examination and treatment of patients.:To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

A unique macroscopic (gross) anatomic structure that performs specific functions. It is composed of various tissues.  An organ is part of an anatomic system or a body region. Representative examples include the heart, lung, liver, spleen, and uterus.
Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.
To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

Property.preferredDefinition: Position in relation to the surroundings.

Concepts.definition: A position in relation to its surroundings.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._Be specific about something; define clearly.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Be specific about something; define clearly.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 7/19/17 jk transferred context and added registration status, CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 4/28/15 released. jc  4/7/15 VD versioned per COG WG: inc to 100 char, remove min limit, chg concept domain to assessment result. jc 1/25/13 added ACRIN Old caBIG CSI.  3/21/12 - changed origin from IVI to ACRIN.  3/5/08 - released for UoWASH FES CRF.   7/23/07-created for ACRIN PET CDEs
